comments:
To recreate:
 1. Open the Mozilla Perspective
 2. Open the DOM Inspector view
 3. Launch a url or project file in the mozilla browser
 4. Select the Loading node in the DOM Inspector

The following appears in the Error Log:
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.atf.mozilla.ide.ui.inspector.DOMContentProvider$MessageNode
	at org.eclipse.atf.mozilla.ide.ui.inspector.DOMInspectorPage$1.getSelectedNode(DOMInspectorPage.java:125)
	at org.eclipse.atf.mozilla.ide.ui.browser.MozBrowserEditor.selectionChanged(MozBrowserEditor.java:888)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.AbstractSelectionService.fireSelection(AbstractSelectionService.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.AbstractSelectionService$1.selectionChanged(AbstractSelectionService.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.ui.part.PageBookView$4.run(PageBookView.java:246)
selection of the Loading node is not ignored and considered as clearing the selection
